availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Aaron H. Wheeler (Nicholas + Harrison County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Reed Wheeler in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1832. Father of Sarah Wheeler, John Wheeler, Levi Wheeler, Judith Jane Wheeler, Arey Ellen Wheeler, Arminda S. Wheeler, Joseph Wheeler, and Julia Wheeler. Married to Rebecca Britain Wheeler in Mason County in November 1854.. Father of Mary A. Wheeler. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 443A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, Film #000281842.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, Film #000281844.
